section.text: *NOTE: This section includes amendments by emergency legislation that will expire on August 22, 2023. To view the text of this section after the expiration of all emergency and temporary legislation, click this link: Permanent Version.*
section.heading: Third-party delivery platform [service]; registration requirement.
section.text: A third-party food delivery service operating in the District shall register with the Department of Licensing and Consumer Protection.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(g) of Food Delivery Fees Transparency Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-108, May 24, 2023, DCR ).
